channel.title: Godsword problems
channel.description: When I equip any two-handed weapon after I used with SilentCJ's 100% Godsword walk, run, attack, etc. tutorial, the attack style interface shows the previous weapon I equiped. Example, instead of saying "Weapon: Bandos godsword", it will say "Weapon: Abyssal whip"... Anyone have any suggestions on why it's doing this and/or how I fix this. Any help will be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Godsword problems
item.dc:creator: @Piled_by_Noobs Piled by Noobs
item.description:
@Piled_by_Noobs wrote:

[quote=“crimsonbow13, post:2, topic:325209”]Did you use Abyssal whip substitute for bandos gs? If you did, you just need to change the name of it.[/quote]What?.. That was an example, when I equip ANY godsword, it says “Weapon:(Previous weapon)”. (Previous weapon) could be ANY weapon, doesn’t matter. and it has the same attack interface, if I was unarmed it would be that way with a godsword. If the previous weapon didn’t have a special, then the godsword doesn’t until I equip a weapon with a special, then equip a godsword.

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword problems
item.dc:creator: @crimsonbow13 crimsonbow13
item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

Did you use Abyssal whip substitute for bandos gs? If you did, you just need to change the name of it.

Read full topic
